trans-unit.source: Represents a single requested claim in a security token request (RST).
Represents a single claim inside a wst:Claims element in a wst:RequestSecurityToken message.

The entire contents of the wst:Claims element is represented by a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaimCollection> which is a collection of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim> objects.
The contents of the wst:Claims element is accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken.Claims%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

A <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim> object represents a request for a claim, identified by its claim type (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.ClaimType%2A> property), to be present in the security token issued by the STS.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.IsOptional%2A> property indicates whether the claim is required in the in the issued token.
For more information about the element that this class represents, see the version of the WS-Trust specification that applies to your scenario.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim"></xref> class with the specified claim type.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.IsOptional%2A> property is set to `false` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.Value%2A> property is set to `null` in the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim> instance.
This constructor creates a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim> object that represents a request for a claim that is required in the response.
The URI that represents the claim type.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim"></xref> class with the specified claim type and a value that indicates whether the claim is optional.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.Value%2A> property is set to `null` in the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim> instance.
The URI that represents the claim type.
`true` if the claim is optional in the response; otherwise `false`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim"></xref> class with the specified claim type, claim value, and a value that indicates whether the claim is optional.
The URI that represents the claim type.
`true` if the claim is optional in the response; otherwise `false`.
The value of the claim.
Gets the type of the requested claim.
Represents the contents of the ClaimType Uri attribute.
The URI that represents the claim type.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the request claim is optional in the response.
Represents the ClaimType optional attribute.
`true` if the claim is optional in the response; otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets the requested claim value.
Represents the contents of the ClaimType value element.
The value of the claim.
